DPU_StaticClutterProc_ScratchBuf_t Struct Reference
staticClutterProc DPU External » staticclutterproc DPU External Data Structures

Scratch buffer used by DPU. More...

#include <dpu/staticclutterproc/staticclutterproc.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t bufSize
 Scratch buffer size in bytes.
Size must be at least:
Y*2*sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)
Where:
For R4F: Y is equal to numDopplerChirps
For DSP (C674X): Y is the smallest multiple of 4 greater or equal to numDopplerChirps
.
 
void * buf
 Scratch buffer data pointer.
For R4F:
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_STATICCLUTTERPROC_SCRATCHBUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT_R4F
For DSP (C674X):
Byte alignment Requirement = DPU_STATICCLUTTERPROC_SCRATCHBUFFER_BYTE_ALIGNMENT_DSP
.
 

Detailed Description

Scratch buffer used by DPU.

The structure defines the scratch buffer interface, including size and data pointer. This buffer should be allocated from internal memory (TCMB if running on R4F and L2/L1 SRAM on DSP) as the clutter removal algorithm will be performed on data sitting on this buffer.
